title: Successful Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using valid email and password, session is persisted, and the user is redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter a valid email and password
Click the login button
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard page
Verify user session is persisted after page reload
Verify protected routes are accessible and non-authenticated routes are restricted

title: Failed Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and an error message is shown when invalid email or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter an invalid email or password
Click the login button
Verify error notification is displayed indicating invalid credentials
Verify user remains on login page and is not redirected

title: Dashboard KPI Display and Filtering
description: Verify dashboard KPIs and charts update correctly when filters (client, agency, channel, date range) are applied and global country selector affects data accordingly.

steps.description: Login successfully and navigate to the dashboard page
Apply a filter by a specific client
Verify dashboard KPIs and charts update to reflect selected client data
Change country selector to another country
Verify currency formatting, KPIs, and charts update accordingly
Apply multiple filters including agency, channel, and date range
Verify all KPIs and charts update correctly and reflect combined filters

title: Invoice Management with Filtering, Pagination, and Inline Editing
description: Verify invoice management supports filtering by client, agency, channel, pagination navigation, and inline editing of internal invoice numbers.

steps.description: Navigate to invoice management page
Filter invoices by client, agency, and channel separately and in combination
Verify invoice list updates to show only matching records
Navigate between multiple pages of paginated results
Verify correct invoices are displayed for each page
Click to edit internal invoice number inline
Change internal number with valid input and save
Verify internal number is updated and persisted
Attempt inline editing with invalid input (e.g., empty or invalid format)
Verify validation error is shown and changes are not saved

title: Register Payment via Payment Modal and Verify Invoice Status Update
description: Verify payment registration through the payment modal updates payment records and refreshes invoice payment status correctly.

steps.description: Open invoice list and select one invoice with unpaid status
Open payment modal for the selected invoice
Enter valid payment details and submit
Verify payment is recorded under payments
Verify invoice payment status badge updates to reflect payment
Verify invoice list refreshes and shows updated invoice status

title: Payments Page Search and Filter Functionality
description: Verify the payments page supports searching payments, filtering by date, and displays linked invoice details in modals.

steps.description: Navigate to payments page
Use search box to find specific payments by payer name or reference
Verify search results include only matching payment records
Apply date range filter for payments
Verify payments list updates to show payments within selected date range
Select a payment and open payment details modal
Verify modal displays linked invoice details accurately

title: Collections KPIs and Filtering
description: Verify collections page shows accurate KPIs and charts summarizing payment collections and updates results correctly when filtered by client, agency, and date.

steps.description: Navigate to collections page
Verify initial KPIs and charts display accurate aggregated payment collection data
Apply filter for a specific client
Verify KPIs and charts update to show collections for the selected client
Apply agency filter and date range filter consecutively
Verify KPIs and charts update to reflect combined filters

title: Client Management CRUD Operations and Email Handling
description: Verify full lifecycle of client creation, editing, deletion with proper validations and management of associated email addresses and agency assignments.

steps.description: Navigate to client management page
Create a new client with all required fields and multiple valid email addresses
Verify client appears in the list with correct details and emails
Edit the client to update details and add/remove emails
Verify updates are persisted and reflected in UI
Assign an agency to the client and save changes
Verify client-agency relationship updates correctly
Try creating or updating client with invalid data (e.g., invalid email format, missing required fields)
Verify validation errors are displayed and changes are not saved
Delete an existing client
Verify client is removed from the list and related UI updates

title: Agency Management CRUD and Relationship Handling
description: Verify adding, editing, deleting agencies with proper input validation and maintenance of relationships with clients.

steps.description: Navigate to agency management page
Add a new agency with valid input
Verify agency appears in the list
Edit agency details and save
Verify updated agency details are persisted
Attempt to add or edit agency with missing or invalid data
Verify validation errors are shown and save is blocked
Delete an agency and confirm
Verify agency is removed and client relationships are updated accordingly

title: File Management: Upload, Filtering, Sorting, Download, Deletion, and Email Sending
description: Verify full file management workflow including drag-and-drop upload with metadata, filtering and sorting file list, downloading files, deleting files, and sending files via email functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to file management page
Upload files using drag-and-drop with correct metadata inputs
Verify uploaded files appear in the file list with correct metadata
Apply filters and sorting on file category and date
Verify file list updates accordingly
Download a selected file
Verify file is downloaded correctly
Delete a file and confirm
Verify file is removed from the list
Use email functionality to send a file to a valid email address
Verify email is sent successfully and user receives confirmation
Attempt upload of invalid file types or size
Verify validation error messages and rejection of files

title: Country Selector Affects Currency Display and Data Filtering
description: Verify the global country selector changes currency formatting, exchange rates, and filters UI data across modules with persistence after page reload.

steps.description: Login and observe default country and currency settings
Change country selector to each supported country (CLP, ARS, USD)
Verify currency symbols and exchange rates update accordingly throughout UI
Verify data filtering respects selected country context
Reload the application
Verify selected country and currency preferences persist

title: Theme Toggle Switch and Persistence
description: Verify that users can toggle between light and dark themes and that the selected theme applies immediately and persists across sessions, using system preference detection on first load.

steps.description: Observe initial theme applies based on system preference
Toggle theme switch to change themes
Verify UI theme changes instantly
Reload the page or browser
Verify selected theme persists after reload

title: Route and Component Loading and Error State Handling
description: Verify that all routes and components handle loading states gracefully with spinners or placeholders and show user-friendly error notifications for failures.

steps.description: Simulate slow network or delayed API response on navigation to dashboard, invoices, payments, clients, and files
Verify loading indicators or placeholders display appropriately
Simulate API error or network failure on data fetch
Verify error notifications appear with meaningful messages
Verify UI remains stable and user can retry actions or reload

title: Invoice Payment Status Badge Updates Correctly
description: Verify invoice payment status badges reflect correct status after payment registration and when invoices are filtered or paginated.

steps.description: View invoices with different payment statuses (unpaid, partially paid, fully paid)
Verify badges display correct payment status color and label
Register a new payment for an unpaid invoice
Verify invoice badge updates from unpaid to partially or fully paid as applicable
Filter invoices by payment status
Verify filtered list only includes invoices with selected payment status
